useRequiredTenant: Use of the {{tenantName}} ItsMyCargo webshop requires accepting the terms and conditions laid out by {{tenantName}}.
useRequiredIMC: ItsMyCargo webshop requires accepting the terms and conditions laid out on the Terms and Conditions page.
withdrawWarningHead: As such if you decide to withdraw your agreement to the terms and conditions you will not
withdrawWarningTail: be able to continue using the shop and we will have to close the window
agreeAgainTenant: Should you wish to resume using the {{tenantName}} ItsMyCargo Shop you will need to agree to the terms and conditions again
agreeAgainGeneral: Should you wish to resume using one of the ItsMyCargo Shops you will need to agree to the terms and conditions again
optOutActionHead: By clicking the Opt Out button below the following will happen:
accountMarked: Your user account will be marked as not agreeing to the {{tenantName}} Terms and Conditions
nonConsenting: Your user account will be marked as not consenting to the use of cookies
optOutActionTail: You will be logged out and returned to the landing page
